text: The 2017 Engie Open Andrézieux-Bouthéon 42 was a professional tennis tournament played on indoor hard courts. It was the seventh edition of the tournament and part of the 2017 ITF Women's Circuit, offering a total of $60,000 in prize money. It took place in Andrézieux-Bouthéon, France, from 23–29 January 2017. ==Singles main draw entrants== === Seeds === {|class="sortable wikitable" |- ! width="70"| Country ! width="175"| Player ! Rank1 ! Ivana Jorović, 6–4, 7–6(7–5) ===Doubles=== * Nicola Geuer / Anna Zaja def. Ana Bogdan / Ioana Loredana Roșca, 6–3, 2–2 ret. == External links == * 2017 Engie Open Andrézieux-Bouthéon 42 at ITFtennis.com * Official website Category:2017 in French sport Category:2017 ITF Women's Circuit 2017 2017
